title: RFK Jr. expels entire CDC vaccine advisory committee
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert Kennedy Jr. removed a 17-member panel at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention that issues recommendations on vaccines.

title: Newsom calls Trump's Marine deployment a 'blatant abuse of power'
shortDescription: Tensions flared in Los Angeles late Monday after Trump escalated military presence in the region against the wishes of California Gov. Gavin Newsom.

title: Trump is front and center for Army's DC birthday parade
shortDescription: Trump is poised to be president during the 250th anniversary of the nation's founding, the FIFA World Cup in 2026 and the LA Summer Olympics in 2028.

title: Gavin Newsom, GOP leaders in dogfight for the ages over LA protests
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom has clashed with several GOP officials over the hostile LA protests from Vice President JD Vance to U.S. Senator Tom Cotton.

title: Trump-Newsom engage in 'high-stakes' clash of political heavyweights
shortDescription: Trump said Newsom should be arrested. The California governor is initiating a lawsuit against the Trump administration. Their rivalry goes back years.

title: Where DOGE goes now with the Trump-Musk alliance shattered
shortDescription: President Trump said DOGE's work is "not finished at all" after his relationship with Elon Musk blew up in spectacular fashion last week.

title: Trump's military parade preparations underway as tanks arrive in DC
shortDescription: A massive military parade will take place in D.C. on June 14 to mark the Army's 250th anniversary, which falls on President Trump's birthday.

title: RFK Jr. fires entire CDC vaccine advisory committee
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. ousted all 17 members of a panel that advises the CDC on the safety, efficacy and clinical needs of vaccines.

title: Going to Trump's DC parade? Expect scans, drones. No pets.
shortDescription: Officials gave a preview of what to expect at the Army's 250th birthday celebration and military parade.

title: Trump pressed on Musk using drugs in White House: 'I hope not'
shortDescription: Reporters asked Trump if he was away of Elon Musk using drugs in the White House. The president replied he didn't know but added, 'I hope not.'

title: Is Musk ready for a deÃÅtente with Trump? X posts reveal new stance
shortDescription: Two days after Musk dropped a bomb on his friendship with Trump, the mercurial billionaire appeared to be rethinking his decision.

title: Trump scores in polls on immigration, as LA protests rage
shortDescription: In recent polls, voters are more likely to approve of the president's immigration policies than his handling of other major issues.

title: Cash for kids: Trump touts plan for babies' investment accounts
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is pushing a program that would create and put his name on investment accounts for babies if the GOP tax bill becomes law.
